page.title: 13schools in Saffron Walden
page.content:
These are the schools in town. Katherine Semar Infant School Katherine Semar Junior School R.A.Butler Infant School R.A.Butler Junior School St. Mary's C of E Aided J.M.I. School St. Thomas More R.C. Aided J.M.I. School Saffron Walden County High School which takes pupils from 11-18
Dame Johane Bradbury Prep School and The Friends School are independant schools.
Katherine Semar gave Â£20 to build a school in 1510 in the town, not these, they are new. R.A. Butler was Education Minister in the wartime coalition government and the local MP.
